entry.title: BIP 174 thoughts on graphics
entry.summary: The context of the provided links is about fixing the graphics. The graphics in question are not scalable bitmap/png, have broken capitalization and are not easy to edit plaintext for git. The user is encouraged to view a suggestion for an example on ShareLaTex. Additionally, there is a non-text attachment called 'signature.asc' which is an OpenPGP digital signature.
